member.name: M:Linkar.Functions.Persistent.TABLE.LinkarClient.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the LinkarClt class.
member.param: The maximum time in seconds that the client will keep waiting the answer by the server. By default 0 (wait indefinitely). When the receiveTimeout argument is omitted in any operation, the value set here will be applied.

member.name: M:Linkar.Functions.Persistent.TABLE.LinkarClient.Login(Linkar.CredentialOptions,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Starts the communication with a server allowing making use of the rest of functions until the Close method is executed or the connection with the server gets lost, in a synchronous way.
member.param: Object that defines the necessary data to access to the Linkar Server: Username, Password, EntryPoint, Language, FreeText.

Free text that will travel until the database to make the admin being able to manage additional behaviours in the standard routine SUB.LK.MAIN.CONTROL.CUSTOM. This routine will be called if the argument has content.
The maximum time in seconds that the client will keep waiting the answer by the server. By default 0 (wait indefinitely).

member.name: M:Linkar.Functions.Persistent.TABLE.LinkarClient.Logout(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Closes the communication with the server, that previously has been opened with a Login function, in a synchronous way.
member.param: Free text that will travel until the database to make the admin being able to manage additional behaviours in the standard routine SUB.LK.MAIN.CONTROL.CUSTOM. This routine will be called if the argument has content.
The maximum time in seconds that the client will keep waiting the answer by the server. By default 0 (wait indefinitely).

member.name: M:Linkar.Functions.Persistent.TABLE.LinkarClient.LkSchemas(Linkar.LkSchemasOptions,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of all the Schemas defined in Linkar Schemas, or the EntryPoint account data files, synchronously only, with TABLE output format.
member.param: This object defines the different options in base of the asked Schema Type: LKSCHEMAS, SQLMODE o DICTIONARIES.

Free text that will travel until the database to make the admin being able to manage additional behaviours in the standard routine SUB.LK.MAIN.CONTROL.CUSTOM. This routine will be called if the argument has content.
The maximum time in seconds that the client will keep waiting the answer by the server. By default 0 (wait indefinitely).

member.name: M:Linkar.Functions.Persistent.TABLE.LinkarClient.LkProperties(System.String,Linkar.LkPropertiesOptions,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the Schema properties list defined in Linkar Schemas or the file dictionaries, synchronously only, with TABLE output format.
member.param: File name to LkProperties
This object defines the different options in base of the asked Schema Type: LKSCHEMAS, SQLMODE o DICTIONARIES.

Free text that will travel until the database to make the admin being able to manage additional behaviours in the standard routine SUB.LK.MAIN.CONTROL.CUSTOM. This routine will be called if the argument has content.
The maximum time in seconds that the client will keep waiting the answer by the server. By default 0 (wait indefinitely).

member.name: M:Linkar.Functions.Persistent.TABLE.LinkarClient.GetTable(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,Linkar.TableOptions,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a query result in a table format, synchronously only, with TABLE output format.
member.param: File or table name defined in Linkar Schemas. Table notation is: MainTable[.MVTable[.SVTable]]
Fragment of the phrase that indicate the selection condition. For example WITH CUSTOMER = '1'
Is the list of dictionaries to read, separated by space. If dictionaries are not indicated the function will read the complete buffer. For example CUSTOMER DATE ITEM
Fragment of the phrase that indicates the selection order. If there is a selection rule Linkar will execute a SSELECT, otherwise Linkar will execute a SELECT. For example BY CUSTOMER
Different function options: rowHeaders, rowProperties, onlyVisibe, usePropertyNames, repeatValues, applyConversion, applyFormat, calculated, pagination, regPage, numPage.

Free text that will travel until the database to make the admin being able to manage additional behaviours in the standard routine SUB.LK.MAIN.CONTROL.CUSTOM. This routine will be called if the argument has content.
The maximum time in seconds that the client will keep waiting the answer by the server. By default 0 (wait indefinitely).

member.name: M:Linkar.Functions.Persistent.TABLE.LinkarClient.LoginAsync(Linkar.CredentialOptions,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Closes the communication with the server, that previously has been opened with a Login function, ina asynchronous way.
member.param: Object that defines the necessary data to access to the Linkar Server: Username, Password, EntryPoint, Language, FreeText.

Free text that will travel until the database to make the admin being able to manage additional behaviours in the standard routine SUB.LK.MAIN.CONTROL.CUSTOM. This routine will be called if the argument has content.
The maximum time in seconds that the client will keep waiting the answer by the server. By default 0 (wait indefinitely).

member.summary: Reads one or several records of a file ina asynchronous way with TABLE output format.
member.param: Free text that will travel until the database to make the admin being able to manage additional behaviours in the standard routine SUB.LK.MAIN.CONTROL.CUSTOM. This routine will be called if the argument has content.
The maximum time in seconds that the client will keep waiting the answer by the server. By default 0 (wait indefinitely).

The maximum time in seconds that the client will keep waiting the answer by the server. By default 0 (wait indefinitely).

member.summary: Returns a query result in a table format, synchronously only, with TABLE output format.
